data.name: Loot Express Delivery Service
data.detailed_description:
A brief introduction


Loot Express Delivery Service is a top-down 2D pixel art game.
You are about to play the commander in this exploration game and you try to capture valuable items from an alien planet.
To offer this service you have just founded your own company.
To complete the missions successfully, you have a team of mercenaries and you can place turrets, rocket launchers and more with the help of drones.
Everything wants to be paid for and you should keep an eye on your costs.

Gameplay


You start with a small team and give orders to the different team members about what they have to do.
There are a total of 3 different units that you can give orders to.

The Worker:
- Does all the work like building campfires, cutting trees or building turrets.



The Soldier:
- Protects his surroundings and attacks all approaching enemies.



The Scientist:
- Is able to search buildings and caves to find clues and artifacts.



You can also use drones to deliver turrets, rocket launchers, mobile lamps and the like to defend your base or support your team in the field.
Explore the environment, build a secure base, find the loot and complete your mission.

data.short_description: Loot Express Delivery Service is a top-down 2D pixel art game.You are about to play the commander in this exploration game and you try to capture valuable items from an alien planet.Complete the missions efficiently and lead your new company to success.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Resolution of 1080p or more

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Resolution of 1080p or more

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Resolution of 1080p or more
